item.title: Freecodecamp The Story of a Moderate Achievement
item.description: The title of this post says “a moderate achievement” and in reality it is, but I am still proud of the topic that I’m about to talk about. I mentioned in one of my first posts on this blog that I started using freeCodeCamp many years ago as one of my first forays into learning front end development. At the time HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I was dedicated for a number of month and almost completed the front end certificate, which consisted of about 300 hours of study.
